title: Daisy, Dad and the Huge, Small Surprise
description: Welcome to my it's weird, but kind of wonderful... Ally knows love makes you do funny stuff, but it doesn't explain Grandma's behaviour. Sure, she's got a lot on her mind with the wedding in just a few weeks, but what's with all the secrecy And Grandma's not the only one bitten by the love-bug. It seems Ally's little brother has a crush on his new teacher - trouble is, so does Dad.... Eek
author: Karen McCombie
